entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Tofino
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind light except northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 over exposed coastal sections this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Rain beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 30 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain at times heavy. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 over exposed coastal sections overnight. Wind becoming west 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023
